description: Retrieves information for each created fleet in an Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A pagination token for the next set of results. If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next set of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

nested_items.name: fleetSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of information for each fleet.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the fleet.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the fleet.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A brief description of the fleet.

nested_items.name: signalCatalogArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the signal catalog associated with the fleet.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time the fleet was created, in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: lastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The time the fleet was last updated in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.
